document_data.name: Eldath's Mount
document_data.mainbody: '''Eldath's Mount''' was a peak in the [[Troll Mountains (Amn)|Troll Mountains]] of [[Amn]] at which the great [[Green Goddess Falls]] was located. The falls were a part of the [[River Rimril]], and the [[Duskwood Dell]] into which the waters flowed was a sacred site to the goddess [[Eldath]].
